title: Petition to add what's truly missing on the map...
body:
So, I was looking at the map, as I do every now and then, when I was suddenly struck with horror upon realizing that something very important was missing. Indeed, Riot's map is accurate, interesting, and incredibly well-made... But they fucked up on that one I swear. 

Sure, they have a lot to do, and they can't always update the map. Sure, this map is a great gift for us lore nerds. But it's not accurate as you may think. Something _really_ important is missing... 

####**_~~WHY ISN'T THERE HALF A FORTRESS FLYING OVER IONIA?~~_**

Yes, you heard me right. There should be half a fortress flying over Ionia. But there isn't? **Even worse!** Fae'lor is a pin on the map, despite the fact that it was destroyed and taken away by Syndra! 

I cannot enjoy the map at its fullest knowing that. This is truly, truly disappointing. I trust Riot will make the right decision concerning that now that this is a known issue. 

Please give us the half fortress we deserve. 

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

replies.body: _Heavy sweating_
FEE FIE FOE FUM THE LACK OF THIS FORTRESS IS REALLY DUMB (says the implied sky giant)
I don't think that story came out till AFTER the map, tho?
True - tho Syndra having a flying fortress was still present in her old lore :p

Definitely half-fortresses. 
Don't mind my icon.
MARK KLED'S PROPERTY
Well everything _on_ Runeterra belongs to Kled... But the flying fortress isn't on Runeterra. It is _above_ Runeterra...

Update his relationships. 

He should be rivals with Pyke, Sylas, and Kai'sa but they aren't listed!!!!
Cats, And Dogs. Also a half fortress made from fluffy cats and dogs.

Tbh I was quite surprised when the Syndra story first went live and the fortress was nowhere to be seen.

Oh well. Maybe Riot will deliver on it one day...
Maybe... But well - Syndra isn't that popular of a champ so it may take a little while :p
Perhaps in another Ionian update? Maybe it'll take a while, but I don't think Riot will neglect her all the way...

Oh don't get me wrong I'm not giving up on hope :p But I doubt she'll get much this year especially knowing we won't have any Ionian release.

Though I must say I'm still hoping to see a color story pop up for her sometimes this year, now that random color story additions are a thing...
Yeah, perhaps....
Birds.
nya~ ?

Here's the thing - Fae'lor is still on the map in the spot where the pin is, it's just halved in size.

And anyway, this is a map of Runeterra and as you said, the fortress is above Runeterra and as such would not appear on the map.

For all we know, the map might even be from the perspective of the fortress and Syndra's taken an interest in cartography.

I know. It's not meant to be serious. Though you could argue it's not only half gone - given how old and in ruin the fortress was, it's likely that the part that wasn't taken away collapsed.

I'm not quite sure this is a valid argument? Bandle City appears on the map and isn't on Runeterra...? 

As I said I meant it as a joke. I don't care whether or not Syndra's flying fortress is shown on the map or not.
Half-fortress > Cats > Dogs
